verses.roman:
pāche sei ācaribā, yei tomāra mana
āpana-icchāya cala, raha,--ke kare vāraṇa"

synonyms: pāche—thereafter; sei—that; ācaribā—You will do; yei—what; tomāra mana—You like; āpana-icchāya—by Your sweet will; cala—You always go; raha—You remain; ke—who; kare vāraṇa—can stop You.
translation: "After remaining here for four months, You may be free to do as You like. Actually no one can stop You from going or remaining."
